verses.text: Ach in Diosal yujto tzin a xajanej, ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayin. Ha yuj a niwan oq'uelk'olal, sucsat in mul.
B'ic in el t'a masanil in mul, tzin a sacb'itani.
Yel toni ix och in mul, ix in ek' t'a yib'anh, max b'atlaj satk'olal junok rato in mul chi' vuuj.
Ix och val in mul chi' t'ayach. Ix in k'ulej chukal t'a yol a sat. Yuj chi' smoj val ak'an in yaelal. Max yal-laj yalchaj chukal t'ayach ayic tzin a ch'olb'itani.
Val yel, yictax valjub'al chuk in. Toxonton chuk in atax yic cuchb'il into och yuj ix in nun.
Val yel tza xajanej mach sgana tojolal t'a smasanil sk'ool. Yuj chi' ak' a jelanil t'ayin.
nhiccanel in mul yic tzin sacb'icaneli. B'ic in eli, yic wach' sacxonhej tzin ajkan icha q'uen sacb'acom.
Ak'xi in tzalajk'olal in k'ana' yic tz'el in cusk'olal yuj b'aj ix ak' in yaelal sik'lab'il.
Manhxo a nacot in mul chi', tza sucan sat masanil in chukal.
Ach in Diosal, tojolb'itej in pensar. Ha junok ak' b'eyb'al tzak' t'ayin yic tzin k'anab'ajej yet' smasanil in k'ool.
Manh in ik'canel t'a ichanh, manh ik'paxel a Santo Espíritu t'ayin.
Ak'xi in tzalajk'olal yuj in colnab'il. Ak' vip yic b'ecan in k'ool ach in k'anab'ajani,
yic wach' tzin k'ayb'ej eb' chuk yic sb'eyb'alej a b'eyb'al eb' yic smeltzajoch eb' t'a yol a k'ab'.
Ach in Diosal, ix ak' in colnab'il, manhxo a cha in mil anima, colinel t'a in mul yic ol valan a tojolal t'a b'italil.
Mamin, jac in ti' yic ol ach in b'itani.
Tato a ofrenda, ma silab' nhusb'il tza nib'ej, tzam vak'laj, ocxo jun, max a nib'ej paxlaj.
Ha tas a gana, aton eb' scus sk'ol yuj smul. Ach in Diosal, max a patiquejel-laj anima syiq'uem sb'a yujto sna sb'a yuj smul.
Ak' a wach'k'olal t'a Sion. Yuj swach'il a k'ool, b'oxiq'ue smuroal Jerusalén.
Ichato val chi' t'a tzalajk'olal ol aj a chaan silab' a gana tz'ak'ji t'ayach, aton nok' nok' snhusji. Ichato chi' ol ak'joc nok' vacax silab'il t'ayach t'a altar.
